personal_code_title: What is their Companies House personal code?
personal_code_details_summaryText: Where to find the Companies House personal code
personal_code_details_body_11_character_: This is an 11 character code that is given to a person after they have verified their identity with Companies House.
personal_code_details_body_find_your_cod: You can find your code in the ‘Manage account’ section of your
personal_code_details_body_be_signed_in: You need to be signed in using the same email address you used when you verified your identity.
personal_code_details_body_verified_by_a: If your identity was verified by an authorised agent, we sent the personal code to the email address the agent provided for you.
personal_code_error_summary: Enter a Companies House personal code
personal_code_error_inline: Enter a Companies House personal code
